des:
"Truth or Drink" is an Alexa Skill that blends trivia with fun and a splash of drinks! Answer questions with "yes," "no," "true," or "false", and every incorrect response comes with a twist—you drink! Perfect for parties, game nights, or casual fun with friends. 🍹

🍹 SINGLE PLAYER MODE 🍹

• Test your knowledge: Answer trivia questions with "yes," "no," "true," or "false."
• Drink on mistakes: Get it wrong? Time to take a sip! 🥤
• Track your score: Say "stop" anytime to hear how many questions you’ve answered correctly.
• Milestone reminders: Alexa announces your score every 10 questions to keep you in the loop.

🍹 MULTIPLAYER MODE 🍹
• Challenge your friends: Up to 4 players can join the game and take turns answering.
• Drink responsibly: Each wrong answer means a sip for the player who missed it.
• Leaderboard updates: Every 20 questions, Alexa reveals who’s leading—and who’s sipping the most!

🍹 EXCITING FEATURES 🍹
• Learn and laugh: After every incorrect answer, Alexa shares the right response and a fun fact or explanation.
• Repeat if needed: Missed the question? Just say "repeat," and Alexa will replay it for you.
• Player roasts: Alexa keeps it cheeky by offering playful comments to those who miss the most questions.

🎭 ENDGAME FUN 🎭
• Crown the champ: At the end, Alexa announces the player with the most correct answers as the trivia master. 🏆
• Toast the underdog: The player with the most mistakes gets a playful roast and a toast. Cheers! 🥂

🍺 DRINK, LAUGH, AND PLAY RESPONSIBLY! 🍺
Whether you're showing off your smarts or sipping your way through, "Truth or Drink" is your ultimate trivia party game. Perfect for creating memorable moments with friends! 🎉

*For adults only—enjoy responsibly and know your limits! 🥳
